channel.title: Wierd error?
channel.description: Hi alright this has never happened to me..here is my error i opened my source file i click runserver and i tyr login with the server ip 127.0.0.1 and it says error connecting to server ...i try login to webclient...i use because when i donwload moparscape runbot doesn't work and i cannont find..ok so when i log in it says error connecting to server and i look at command prompt of runserver and it doesn't say anything like accepted from localhost...wierd error please help as quick as possible

item.title: Wierd error?
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

try 127.0.0.1
localhost
0.0.0.0
or your own ip

it could also be your antiviris blocking it
